message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $120 to us. Considering its true value, I would like to propose a price of $180 for you to consider. This offer allows you to enjoy all the benefits of the product while also ensuring we receive a fair compensation for our efforts and investment. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
